name: Stuck Until Discovered
description:
You are late for work but you’re stuck running around in a loop because you forgot that your office was moved to another part of the city. Luckily, someone left you some clues to help you find the end of this endless loop and move on. You also have to dodge the blue boxes (supposed to be cars but had no time to finish).

Jump = Space Down arrow = confirm the end of the loop

Currently only has two levels, not much UI! If you lose, the game will keep looping as well so you have to refresh the browser to play again! We are our proud of our creation and I hope you are able to enjoy some part of the game!
